fr.insarennes.learningbot.model

Class LearnedData

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.insarennes.learningbot.model.LearnedData

  • public class LearnedData
extends java.lang.Object
    This class saves data from ScannedRobotEvent, in order to keep it and save it later. This data will be used to create decision trees. The robot gathers a new data every time the enemy is detected A "LearnedData" is a set of different characteristics we consider interesting and to which is given the recorded value. E.g : distance_between_robots=10 energy=50
